scripts.system-test: gcloud beta functions deploy helloHttp --trigger-http && BASE_URL="https://$GCP_REGION-$GCLOUD_PROJECT.cloudfunctions.net/" ava -T 10s test/*.test.js
scripts.integration-test: node shim.js http 3000 -t 10000 | (sleep 2 && BASE_URL="http://localhost:3000" ava -T 10s test/*.test.js)
